Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The location of the domain name.
The domain name to be verified. It must conform to the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$.
Docs.summary: Checks whether a domain name in the cloudapp.azure.com zone is available for use.
